title: I need help ID'in g this gothic font please help!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105423im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gothic_3574%5B1)
\_5771.jpg]

Can some one please help me to identify this font?

Ive been searching far and wide and I cant find it!

Thank you so much
author: jimibrown

comments.content:
